tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
quoteText:
Do Not Track signals

Some Internet browsers may be configured to send "Do Not Track" signals to the online services that you visit. We currently do not respond to “Do Not Track” signals. To find out more about "Do Not Track," please visit http://www.allaboutdnt.com.
